description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) in relation to planning permission reference 185158REM dated 25/02/2019 for 'Application for the approval of Reserved Matters pursuant to outline planning permission reference 171562VAR dated 16/10/2017, condition 2 pertaining to the second phase of development (Phase B): details relating to Layout, Appearance, Scale and Landscaping.' Amendment seeks to allow changes to the design for inclusion of a second core and compliance the fire regulations
decision_conditions: The wording of condition no. 2 of planning permission 185158REM dated 25/02/2019 shall now be taken to be:

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: A739-FOR-00-A-DR-12910 Rev P11 (Phase 2 - Building B Ground Floor Plan), A739-FOR-01-A-DR-12911 Rev P3 (Phase 2 - Building B 1st Floor Plan), A739-FOR-02-A-DR-12912 Rev P3 (Phase 2 - Building B 2nd, 3rd, 4th Floor Plan), A739-FOR-05-A-DR-12915 Rev P3 (Phase 2 - Building B 5th Floor Plan), A739-FOR-06-A-DR-12916 Rev P3 (Phase 2 - Building B 6th Floor Plan), A739-FOR-07-A-DR-12917 Rev P3 (Phase 2 - Building B Roof Plan), A739-FOR-EV-A-DR-20810 Rev P5 (Phase 2 - Building B South & North Elevations), A739-FOR-EV-A-DR-20811 Rev P5 (Phase 2 - Building B West & East Elevations), A739-FOR-SC-A-DR-30810 Rev P2 (Phase 2 - Building B Section AA & BB), A739-FOR-SC-A-DR-30811 Rev P2 (Phase 2 - Building B Section CC), A739-INT-00-A-DR-12910 Rev P02 (Phase 2 - Building B Ground Floor Plan), A739-INT-01-A-DR-12911 Rev P02 (Phase 2 - Building B 1st Floor Plan), A739-INT-01-A-DR-12912 Rev P02 (Phase 2 - Building B 2nd, 3rd, 4th Floor Plan), A739-INT-05-A-DR-12915 Rev P02 (Phase 2 - Building B 5th Floor Plan), A739-INT-06-A-DR-12916 Rev P02 (Phase 2 - Building B 6th Floor Plan), A739-INT-RF-A-DR-12917 Rev P02 (Phase 2 - Building B Roof Plan).
